content.detailedDescription: found a ufo base on top of a mountain in navada
content.summary: Google earth view

content.detailedDescription: The first time i saw this was two days prior to second, something caught my eye in sky, at first, thought it was a star; upon further view it had white light in middle then flashing green and red.  i called out my boyfriend and dad to witness and to question what it was.  it was not a plane it hovered for about thirty minutes.  it would flicker in and out and would jump up and down and left and right until it just disappeared.  the next night was cloudy, so waited until tonight, and again in the same spot was the same star like object; this time had binnoculars and when looking through them the object seemed to swirl and had same lights. it was higher in sky and seemed closer.  i watched it for about twenty minutes until it went behind trees.  it moved very slow.  now, i live on hill near woods so the western sky view is the clearest but in the eastern and southern sky there were atleast two more. i caught some of this on my camera/recorder but not the best visual; of course!!  and you cant make out the lights on my camera; but alteast i did capture the object.  my question is:  if this is a satelite then why the green and red strobe type lights; and it was definately not a plane!!  nor do i believe that it is sirius or orion like some sites have suggested.  but what in the heavens is it?
content.summary: On two occasions, i saw star like object in w sky; with green, red, and white lights

content.detailedDescription: My husband had called me on the way home from work around 10:50pm and said that he saw 7 red, circular lights in the northwest sky. i thought he was just being stupid and joking until i came outside and saw them myself, except there were only 2. they just kind of hovered in the sky and made a little triangular motions; moving left to right then upwards every now and then. they were there for maybe 5 minutes or a little less. and then each of them took off towards east and west directions. they were too fast to be any kind of human aircraft we know of. my brother-in-law lives about 2 miles down the road and my husband was talking to him while they were still there and he said that they were moving towards his direction, and saw them when they left. he said they might've been military aircraft, but there was no noise to them at all. that's what we all couldn't understand. and with the fact that they were so fast made us question whether or not they were ufos.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright red circle

content.detailedDescription: Six fast moving points of light around avery black dot.Was witnessed by me and several bus riders,and one security guard.Visable over downtown dayton,almost due north.I was waiting ffor the10:30 pm bus,and for some reason i just looked up.Inoticed these litesand said to theguard do you see what isee?He said yes,and we pointed up and servral others saw them to.I first thougrt they came from the infameous skunk works ,it being the day after 9 11.I was a little awed,but living near wright-patt you never know what you'llsee.I lost sight after i got on the bus.I wathed it for a good teen min.S
content.summary: N/a

content.detailedDescription: Caught me by surprise...Felt nausea afterward!
content.summary: Saw the same thing submitter 28604 saw in southern illinois around 10:00 p.M.

content.detailedDescription:
After scanning the sky for around 15 minutes, focusing ssw where the living room window has the best view, i had been looking up at the crovus constellation and focusing on it when a brilliant yellow fireball like object, black in the front, glowed and streaked towards the direction of the dark side of the moon that was due west in the sky, before abruptly fading out to nothing. it was gone and lasted maybe four or five seconds. 

as the view of the moon started becoming obstructed, i headed outside with camera in hand, and kept focusing west towards the moon while still scanning the rest of the sky. at 1:09am a second object, this one, came out of no where and was brighter and much lower then a normal star, like the previous fireball like object (as the moon was only about 15-20 degrees up in the sky, and it flashed brighter and also streaked from south to north directly towards the dark side of the moon before immediately fading out......To fast for a closed digital camera to respond. 

if anyone else saw anything strange around the moon tonight, april 10th, 2011, dont hesitate to post it here on mufon!!!
content.summary: Two seperate objects, 18 minutes apart, head n towards crescent moon

content.detailedDescription: A few of my friends and me were sitting by the fire, at the moment i was looking towards the sky. i saw a blue light(bright blue)moving toward the ground at approximately a 4:00 position as on clock hands. at the same time, mark yelled "what the hell is that". we had time to stand and walk about 10 ft before it went out of view right where it looked like it should have hit the ground. it looked like a bright ball that was solid blue with a green hue. it wasnt moving fast enough for anything that may have been burning up in the atmosphere from entry plus there wasnt a tail. i had time to ponder what it could be before it went out of sight. it never dimmed or flashed. it looked like a missile  was about to hit. i kept my eyes on the area for at least five minutes then we decided to drive over to the area we saw it. took cameras and binaculars with us but couldnt find it. whatever we saw, in my opinion, was not a meteorite or a firework. im looking online now to see if anyone else reported it.
content.summary: Out of nowhere a bright ball of blue light showed up moving at an angle towards the ground.

content.detailedDescription: The first time i saw this was two days prior to second, something caught my eye in sky, at first, thought it was a star; upon further view it had white light in middle then flashing green and red.  i called out my boyfriend and dad to witness and to question what it was.  it was not a plane it hovered for about thirty minutes.  it would flicker in and out and would jump up and down and left and right until it just disappeared.  the next night was cloudy, so waited until tonight, and again in the same spot was the same star like object; this time had binnoculars and when looking through them the object seemed to swirl and had same lights. it was higher in sky and seemed closer.  i watched it for about twenty minutes until it went behind trees.  it moved very slow.  now, i live on hill near woods so the western sky view is the clearest but in the eastern and southern sky there were atleast two more. i caught some of this on my camera/recorder but not the best visual; of course!!  and you cant make out the lights on my camera; but alteast i did capture the object.  my question is:  if this is a satelite then why the green and red strobe type lights; and it was definately not a plane!!  nor do i believe that it is sirius or orion like some sites have suggested.  but what in the heavens is it?
content.summary: On two occasions, i saw star like object in w sky; with green, red, and white lights

content.detailedDescription: I was driving heading east on saunders settlement road in lockport, ny with my friend mat around 12:45am. we were just talking then all of the sudden a huge green flash caught our eyes to the left over a large farm field. i immediately jumped in my seat and was frightened by this bright neon green flash in the sky because it came out of no where. before we could even say anything to each other about it the green flashing light exploded in to a bright orange color then took off at an incredible speed horizontally then disappeared in a blink of an eye. the object seemed to be a clyndrical shaped fireball almost. after both seeing this we reacted by looking at each other in fear and saying "oh my god! did you just see that?!" we couldn't believe what we've just seen. both of us we're very frightened, i even had goosebumps and found myself breathing very quickly. we were both very freaked out by this..We tried dismissing the sighting off between each other but everything we seemed to suggest it could've been just didnt make sense. we tried dismissing it as a firework or flare of some kind but we both came to the conclusion there is no way thats was possible. a firework or flare doesnt just come into sight from no where with that kind of green explosion, then change almost instantly into orange then fly across the sky horizontally at what seemed like light speed and disappear into nothing. for the remainder of the ride to drop off mat at his house we kept discussing what we had just seen and how scary and freaky it was to have witnessed such a thing. after dropping mat off i found the drive home alone even more scary after just seeing that object in the sky, especially to close to home. i've never seen anything like that in my life, it was extroardinary. mat and i both agreed most people would probably think were crazy if we even tried to explain to them what we witnessed.
content.summary: Bright neon green light which exploded into an orange color then flew across the sky and disappeared in a heartbeat.

content.detailedDescription:
While sitting on my couch, i noticed a light moving out of the corner of my eye. it seemed initially like a headlight, but the color wasn't right, which caught my attention. i turned my head and saw an orange light rise in the sky. it was moving fairly quickly, and leveled off right about eye level (i was on the third story of the house). 

i watched it for a few seconds. it occurred to me i should go get my boyfriend, who was in the other room, but i was afraid i'd lose sight of the object. after maybe thirty seconds, i ran into the room he was in, and we went out onto the balcony. i pointed it out to him, and i ran inside to get the camera. we tried to video tape the object, but the memory card was full. by the time i deleted a few pictures, we had lost sight of the object. it was headed north, moving fairly quickly. 

because we live in an area with quite a few trees, it's difficult to tell if the object just disappeared completely, or was obscured by trees/distance. my boyfriend says it disappeared, whereas it looked more to me like there were just trees blocking the view.
content.summary: Orange light in the sky

content.detailedDescription: In the sky the night of april 6 near 11:30pm i saw something that i can not explain. i was coming up to a four way stop when i saw an approximately 120 ft object gliding southeast at the speed of maybe a helicopter.  with my driver side window rolled down i could not hear anything that resembled the sound of an aircraft, however it was the sight of the object that has changed my mind changed about whether or not something else of higher intelligence could living amoung us.  the object appeared to be heading away from where i was heading; however, within 30 seconds at the next intersection - which happened to be a very well traveled road through carmel,in (n keystone) - i saw the same object now changing directions.  i almost hit a truck at the intersection (roundabout) trying to follow what the object was doing in the sky.  as i continued the same direction as i had been travelling when i saw the object, the object had changed direction and was heading parallel to the diection as my car off off to the left, but much further away.  i travelled about another mile to the north - away from the object - while the object must have been travelling due west.  at my destination, i got out of my car and spotted the object near the treeline behind the neighboring housing across the street and it finally disappeared from my sight approximately 5 minutes from when i first saw it.  this location is very important, becuase just a few months back i spotted a flying object with lights that were pulsating one at a time in a circular motion just like the object that i had just seen from directly beneath.  a few months back the object was hovering in an upwards and downwards motion in realitively the location i lost sight of it the second night.  when i had spotted an object hovering up and down i thought the shape of the object must have been circluar like a flying saucer that you would normally think of when you think of ufos.  (still describing my first sighting) from my perspective looking through an upstairs window the object had flashing lights which lit up one at a time in a sort of triangular fashion - which would make sense for it to be a large disc.  however, the second night when being directly below the object, i saw its four sided bottom with a light at each of the corners pulsating one at a time.  from my point of view beneath the object it distictively had a square bottom. the four sides appeared to each be at the least approximately 120 feet.  being as large and flying relatively low i am sure i can not be the only one who saw this object on the night of april 6, 2011.  i easily came to terms with the first night i saw the strange lights hovering up and down against the treeline that it must have just been some kind of helicopter; however, after seeing the same pattern of flashing lights directly above me - not exactly the same as when i was underneath the object i clearly saw the fourth light that was not visible from afar - i now have the mindset that humans both nights i had spotted a ufo.  i know there could be explanation for the flying object with a flat square bottom and four flashing lights, but until i see or hear about a human-made aircraft i can give no other explanation than seeing something from outerspace.  i did not have the ability to take a good picture either night, but i would like to know if anyone else may have captured this object on camera or could at least share the same type of bewilderment after seeing this object on april 6.  after seeing this i can certainly did have a feeling of embarrasement to describe what i saw to anyone, but i believe the truth must be told, so i submit this anonomously.
content.summary: Rectangle shape ufo sighted in central indiana

content.detailedDescription: Ok. i was with my bff loura, and her boyfriend, jason. it was the night of my 16th birthday. that night,  i had a bday party . we were just enjoying the fresh night air outside.We were all looking at the stars, watching for shooting stars. i started hearing a loud but muffled humming noise, like a bumble bee makes.But it sounded electrical, a very unique noise i'd never heard before. all of a sudden, my girlfriend shouted, "oh my god!!! what the hell is that!!??" i looked over my left shoulder to the mansion across the street from my moms house.On top of this huge house was a craft. it had circle lights of red, orange, green and yellow all around the middle of the craft. it was hovering over the house in a constant, frozen like state. we were simply mesmorized ! it did not move. and i know that not even a helicopter or even a fighter jet can do  that for as long as this craft did.We stood there with our eyes wide open staring and our mouths agape. "no really guys, what is that?? it's not a plane, not anything from our technology! " i said, trying to make sense of what we were all three seeing plain as day right in front of our very faces. we stood there, amazed and in a trance. we were simply spellbound by the mysterious thing we saw and how it hovered motionless and magically and perfectly  just a foot above this house.We watched it for a good ten to 15 minutes. i was totally mystified by this bright colorful disc that i saw. it was about 100 feet across. it was about 20 yards away. it continued to hover above the house . then suddenly i got very  very scared.I was frozen with fear. what was this amazing thing?? "it's probly abducting the people in that house" i said.Laura agreed, she thought so too.I asked jason if he saw and heard what we did.He reluctantly said"yes, i  do see that and it's actually really starting to creep me out!" i felt a shockwave of emotion building up inside me. i have never been so amazed and fascinated and so scared in my whole life. jason started walking towards the craft. laura shouted , "what are you crazy where do you think you are going, mister?" "no... it's ok... i want to see "them"! it'd be so cool!" he argued.Then out of still night i just got this strong feeling that we were being watched.Like whatever we had been looking at realized that we were there, right there next to it. a big whitelight shined down from the bottom center of the disc. well i wasn't about to stick around there and find out what happens next. i turned around and ran as fast as i could back to my moms house. laura and jason quickly followed suit. once we got inside the house, we went into my bedroom and i opened the window.I looked out my window and  i could still see the white light,it was scanning over my moms house and yard. like "they" were searching for us. it was scary as hell. just then, our toy terrier teddy started barking and yelping.  i didn't want to wake anyone up so we all sat on the bed in my room, stunned, in total awe and silence. , and total disbelief of what we had just seen. "are you sure that thing wasn't a plane?" laura asked."awjeez babe, that was crazy! that's what it was!" we nervously all laughed it off.Still amazed , we all three agreed with a pinky promise to never breath one word of what we saw, for fear of ridicule. noone would believe us... they'd think we were stupid, crazy, or just lying for attention. just last year (20 years later) i finally  spilled the beans to my parents about what happenned and what i saw that starry night. they laughed, thinking i was kidding."no mom, for real." i argued. "must of been some good drugs..." my dad kidded me.Well we were completely sober.Neither myself nor laura or jason have scitzophrenia or dilusions. we had no drugs, this thing was as real as real can be. i saw this fascinating thing and ever since have been abducted. i am seeking hypnosis therapy to recall surpressed memories of these encounters.All i know is that one night last week i fell asleep in my bed and later that night must have traveled thru astral plains.I was taken out of my bed and placed on a table.The greyson put this nasty gel in my mouth, i think to keep me from screaming. when i woke up i still had some gross jelly stuff in my mouth , tasting it still. and could still smell the hospital like, sterile but mediciny like smell of the beings. i woke up feeling violated, in every way. i would like to know what is going on.!!
content.summary: I saw it very close up! in fact, it was hovering over the house across the street!!It made a humming, "electrical" sound and had lights all around the silver disc. it was as long as the house, big!

content.detailedDescription:
Since i know it is probably a good idea to at least report this, i am still unsure what this is, so i figure i would at least report it if it's anything. 

i can't recollect anything happening to me last night, but when i woke up this morning i has a bad sharp pain in my hand. it is seven hours later now and it still hurts. when i looked closely at my hand i could see a tiny triangle mark that is lighter than the rest of my hand and it is in the exact spot where the pain is. i took a magnet and ran it over my hand and it started to hurt worse. i don't know if it is a coincidence or in my head but even as i am typing this it is hurting. i tried to take pics but they did not come out well. it doesn't show anything really, but i did put arrows on the pics to show te source of the pain.

so i have no idea if it is from an abduction or not.
content.summary: Possible abduction??

content.detailedDescription: 9:55am standing on my nw facing balcony i heard what sounded like a loud military craft directly over head.  then the sound just stopped.  i looked up north and saw what looked like a very bright star but then it turned indigo, then back to white.  i watched it move east in a slow but steady manner in a straight line slightly going upwards.  i ran inside to grab my camera and it seems it appeared in one of my picture.  upon blowing it up and tinkering with the pic using embossing and black and white reverse i indeed confirmed a disc or round shaped object there in the sky. i lost sight of it as it passed over my roof and out of my view.  no other feelings accompanied this siting other that frenzy to get a pic before it went over the roof.  cannot determine altitude but i've never seen a plane ever fly that high and it made no noise that i could detect after the cessation of the other jet i heard in the beginning.
content.summary: Small star like blob pulsing between bright white and indigo

content.detailedDescription: I use to shoot of estes rockets when i was young so when my youngest son got old enough to enjoy them i built a couple to show him. we have a 1/4 acre behind the house that's historic land. (old camp bowie). suburb all around us. good for shooting of rockets. i took some video of the take off by laying the camera on the ground facing up. after down loading and or playing them on big screen we noticed some real strange things appearing flying disappearing even what looks to be on a flight path to my head ???? only its way up in the sky! all of these orb shape things have what appears to be a lasso with a smaller orb at the end that is circling the big orb. they can change direction in a frame or two. fly very fast and always in motion even when sitting still (lasso circling constantly) i have maybe 10 different videos of these things. i have made copies and blown them up to investigate myself(i still have all the original video on the camera from the original day they were recorded) i really cannot enplane any of them. file 1 two orbs move to head if you view frame by frame you can see what i have described. file 2 slow start but close to end an orb appears in middle. file 2 was the first one we noticed. after reviewing all videos have some orbs or ufo in them.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Reacuring sightings in vidio's of my home made rocket flights

content.detailedDescription:
It was 9am, and the family was sleeping in, rather unusual because so did our new puppy. i was laid back on the couch, much calmer and awake then usual, staring out the window and noticed the chemtrail over soldotna, alaska that was rather low in the sky and shortly after noticing the chemtrail i spotted a "rod," or a "sky fish" as some people would call them streak across the sky behind view of the cottonwood tree in our front yard. this caught my attention enough to grab the digital camera and take pictures of the chemtrail.

i filled up the memory in the camera with the two pics, and while i was deleting some old pictures off the camera, i spotted what was a strange formation of what i originally though were a flock of geese but as i squinted and cleared my eyes to get a better view, it wasn't a flock of anything but 8 oval objects flying in a triangle formation with 2 on the left, 1 in the middle, and 4 or 5 on the right. so i zoomed in with the camera as they got farther away and snapped two pics, and upon pulling the camera away from my eyes, the objects were gone! so of course the next words out of my mouth were profanity....Wtf. followed by, what the hell, where did they go?!? 

the first sky shot i tried to get shows nothing at all, even when superimposed i have found nothing. the second shot was done with the flash on, and again, no objects even faintly appear in the picture yet three strange lines appear in the picture vertically in the sky that were not visible to the naked eye.....Obviously this could have been from the flash. still, i have lived in alaska my entire life, and flocks of birds dont dissapear after taking a picture of them, this flock wasn't flapping. these objects were solid white and oval, with black triangle stationary wings aiming down at about a 35-45 degree angle towards the earth. 

the objects headed in a southern direction, which with the snow melting early this year, this would not have been the path of migratory birds anyways. they would have been headed north.
content.summary: Chemtrail, "rods", triangle flock of 8 oval shaped birds or ufo's?

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving on fry rd, turning right onto heampstead hwy in cypress, texas. i looked above us-290, only 1000 feet or so in front of me, and saw this white/silver, thin object just there. it seemed to be moving to moving parallel to the highway, and as i turned left onto spring cypress rd. the object stopped, then hovered over the freeway, sort of in the upper horizon behind it. as i pulled up to the light to go under the freeway, i lost site of it and decided to pull out my phone and went i went under it. i was going to snap a picture, but by the time i went under the freeway, it was gone and no where to be found.
i thought it was plane at first, because this area is under a landing path for both houston airports, but it was too small to be a plane and when it stopped moving, i thought there is no way it was. the real deal breaker was, there is no way it would have vanished like that if it was an airplane. then i thought it might have been some reflection from the sun in my windshield, but i after i did my errand, i went back and was not able to recreate it.  
i don't really know what it was that made me first notice it, and as far feelings, i was curious and puzzled but other that, can't think of anything.
also, since that happened: three times, i have seen this little speck of blue light for about half a second, about a foot off the ground. i don't know if that anything to do with this or not, but i still feel like i should share that.
this isn't the first time i have seen an object like this, its happened twice before, once near reliant stadium and the other in pearland (that sighting was seen by both my aunt and cousin as well as me)
content.summary: Mysterious silver hovering object

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my balcony around 9:00pm et yesterday working on facebook on my android phone.  i happened to notice something from the corner of my right eye.  i looked up at the sky and say a bright read glowing ball-shaped object that was moderate in size moving due east of my location.  the object was moving at a slow speed from the middle of the sky to the horizon.  i am a smoker, but only smoke on my balcony, never indoors, so i am constantly seeing planes pass over.  this was definitely not a plane or helicopter, or anything i have ever seen before.  the object seemed to flicker, then vanish as it moved toward the horizon.  i was able to capture some of what i saw using the camcorder feature of my phone.  the video footage can be found at
*(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg).
content.summary: Moderately large bright glowing red object

content.detailedDescription:
I woke up to take my dogs out again laid back down and saw the same thing i saw
on april 4th,2011. same time frame or very close.
it was about 5:50 when i was looking at the sky again at the same area
i always look. then right next to the same star as on the 4th a star like object
appears next to the dim star and starts lighting up very very bright. this time
it got very big and very very bright. it was larger than the size of the largest star.
then it dimmed down just like the others and started traveling south very very slow.
slower than the last ones i saw. it was headed south again so i jumped up to grab my
camera and it was gone.
i am going to try to set up a cam but i need a night vision cam.
this is getting very strange and i will try to record the event or get a witness,
content.summary: Another star like objects lights up dims down and flies south

content.detailedDescription:
I woke up to let my dogs out then laid down and noticed the sky was 
clear. i was looking at a star when i saw a light appear right next to the star.
it came out of nowhere and started lighting up really bright not moving at all.
then it dimmed down a bit and traveled south slowly.
i was going to grab my camera but it was too late.
then i am sorry i didn't because here comes another one out of the same spot.
it lights up even brighter than like the one before it dims out a bit and moved south on the same
course as the first one. they were both extremely high up, as high as a star.
i have seen this very same thing before but the light comes out of nowhere really bright
and then dims out and that would be it.
i saw this twice this year but never traveling and never two one right after the next.
content.summary: Star like objects appear lighting up then dimming down and travel south

content.detailedDescription:
At around 10 to 11 pm myself and 5 others witnessed a ufo flying north from across the backyard of my home, at the time, in troy. in total there were 7 of us all standing outside yet only 6 could see the object as it blended in almost perfectly with the night sky. this large group of people included my own brother and another man who would later join the air force of which he is currently enlisted. we were in the back yard of the home smoking cigarettes when an individual frantically pointed to the sky asking something like, "what is that?!" i remember the date because it was not only cinco de mayo but also 5/5/05. had there not been others around to witness the event i likely would have never told anyone about it. 
the object was flying extremely low. it was traveling so slowly that if one of us had chased after it we would have been able to keep up. it was not a large craft. it was a triangular object that gave off absolutely no sound or reflection of the lights below. it almost completely blended into the night sky in a way that seemed like it was mimicking it. it gave off no lights and had no lights on it that i remember seeing. however this event did occur nearly 5 years ago. the object traveled across the entire length of my yard and crossed over south boulevard/ 20 mile rd into rochester hills. because it was so difficult to see against the night sky everyone lost sight of it after it had only traveled a short distance. less than 100 yards. the object flew directly above us and never changed speed. 
when the object crossed south boulevard i could see that it was flying only slightly higher than the telephone poles it was passing over. it also released no vapors or any kind of trail that i could see behind the object. even though one of the people in the group was unable to see the object it is likely due to his poor vision or unwillingness to accept what was occurring around him. other than shock there were no feelings i experienced during this incident. i know what i saw and so do the others who witnessed this event. there is no way this aircraft was earth technology. it made no noise and seemed to cloak itself against the sky. if the object was under intelligent control it would have easily been able to see us gawking at it. it was literally flying so low as it was passing over us that i could have thrown a baseball at it and hit it. this event deeply disturbed me for some time after. it is only until recently that i discovered this website and thought it was necessary that i share my experience.
content.summary: Small, silent, triangular shaped ufo witnessed by 6 people flying extremely close to the ground in troy, michigan on cinco de mayo 2005.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting down upstairs when a big bright light fly by my window and light up the whole area. i got so freaked out i woke up my mom just to make sure i wasn't just imagining it. we went downstairs and it was no where to be found. a few minutes later it comes back into view. this time it doesn't come near the window it lands very quietly in my backyard. in a matter of seconds i hear my back door begin to open. then footsteps. i walk to the stairs to see who or what was there. i went up to the stairs and saw a giant black figure standing there. it looked at me then everything went black. i woke up in the middle of the floor, and my mother was no where to be found. she is still missing to this day. it is very hard to type these words so i am going to stop becuse i knw they hurt you to.
content.summary: I saw the ufo it came in knocked me out and i don`t remember much except waking up in the middle of the floor and having a sharp pain in my back

content.detailedDescription:
On april 4th i was visiting richmond ky. as i was enjoying the country life and driving to see my family, i was taken by the beautiful sunset so i asked my daughter to roll down the window and take a photograph of the sunset for me. it was only upon looking at the series of photographs the next day that i noticed the bright star in the upper right corner of all the shots and decided to zoom in for a closer look.  much to my surprise, it was not a big bright star but clearly a big bright white triangle shaped object.  
upon further examination, i noticed that directly below the triangle, to the right of the light post, is a black circle object that does not look like a plane or helicopter.  
the most significant thing about the place i took the photographs is that it is directly adjacent to the blue grass army depot - which houses large munition storage, chemical weapons, and a new chemical weapon destruction facility.
my thoughts about these photos are either, good job america on the new technology, or, heads up us government and military, we have visitors eyeing blue grass army depot and weapons of mass destruction. americans better hope the intelligence behind this spy craft is ours, and is protecting the airspace around these weapons of mass destruction. let us hope that  bgad is not being targeted for mass destruction of america.
content.summary: Bright large triangle ufo, and circle ufo captured on photo

content.detailedDescription: East to west
content.summary: Arrow

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo sighting over cheung chau, china april 2011, & is still there now on live cam! 

location of sighting: cheung chau, china
date of sighting: april 8, 2011, friday 12:15 (note china is 1 day ahead of usa)

i was watching the weather cam of china and noticed that the next still photo shot of the cam had a long rod like ufo in it. this ufo seems very large and its width can easily be seen.

all of the earlier shots did not have this ufo, probably because the cam only takes one shot per 15 minutes.

another odd thing is that this cam froze at 12:15 and did not take another shot at 12:30 or at 13:00 hours. perhaps the ufo caused the cam to freeze up? i looked at the other cams and all the other 15 cams were still working. 

i *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg) am including the cam address below. 

*link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg.
content.summary: Ufo sighting over cheung chau, china april 2011, & is still there now on live frozen cam!

content.detailedDescription: I was smoking a cigarette with my moms boyfriend when i glanced forward going to walk inside and saw a disk shaped object almost seemingly collapse in on its self. thats all i saw. but i would not like to be contacted unless there have been more sightings of the phenomena. it made me feel like i won the lottery. almost as if you were to meet "god" it was intense. almost too much so to describe.I only saw it for a duration of about three seconds though.
content.summary: Lava orange almost fire orange with an almost brick base

content.detailedDescription:
Ok so i'm looking over this hill we call 4 corners cause there are 4 roads on the top of the hill leading diffrent ways. i took these photo's when i saw a plane passing by but i picked up other lights next to it and also 2 weird images below what i thought was a plane to my extent.

the lights in the middle should of been a plane but the lights on the right side are not. this was very strange since the other photos i took after do not show any images like this one. 

it started out seeing a small blinking light then it moved to the right out of my sight. just a tad later what i thought was a shooting star another white blinking light appears out of no where and shows up where this shooting star passed by. so i started taking photos. when i couldn't see them anymore i started taking more photos when i thought a plane was passing by. so the two red lights in the middle is most likely a plane but i still ended up with other lights in the photo which i do not know what they are. 

and i know for sure when a plane is passing by thats why these white blinking lights caught my attention so much. 

to put in matters short in one of the photos when i zoom in on the images below the lights...Maybe a plane i make out a alien face.

you can see yourselfs...I still don't know what it was.

the last photo will be one i sent before but i want you to compair both alien faces to the most resent one. the one i sent before still boggles my mind cause i still don't know what to make of it. all i did in the photo was adjust the light and color temp to see these images below the lights clearer. the original photos show the images too even on the camera screen i shot the photos on.

remember the red lights are most likely a plane but the white lights are something else. i will send the rest of the photos right after this.
content.summary: Plane or was it? weird figures below it

content.detailedDescription:
Location: varnell, whitfield county,georgia 
 gps location latitude 34.899448, longitude -84.914703
construction sight of new north-east whitfield high school, just east of prater's mill
i was working outside on the construction sight.  at 11:30 am eastern daylight saving time (i checked the time immediately after the sighting), i happened to look up facing south into the clear blue sky.  i saw an incredibly bright, shiny, white oval or square shaped object.  it was about the size of a fingernail at arm length. it was stationary.  i cannot estimate it's distance, there were no clouds in the sky at all. as i watched, in about 2 seconds it narrowed from an oval to a vertical slit, still bright white.  it remained a slit for a couple of seconds, then vanished. the total time i saw it was about 5 seconds. i saw nothing where it had been but the blue sky, no comtrail, no sound.  i continued watching the spot where it had been for any movement for at least a minute more.
my first thought on seeing it was that it reminded me of a light i had seen in the evening sky in 1980 which vanished, but was much closer and larger.  my next thought was relief that this was just an airplane reflecting sunlight and not some strange unidentified object.  but then it didn't move, just stayed in one spot from my perspective.  my next thought was that maybe its not an airplane?  then it narrowed into a vertical slit, still not moving, and i thought "how could an airplane do that?"  and then the slit vanished.  it was not all that small, not just a pinpoint of light.  i can't see how an airplane of that size could just vanish without a trace.  
it looked like a portal closing, like you see in the movies.  i keep trying to convince myself that it was an airplane banking and reflecting the noonday sun from it's surface.  but it didn't have the shape of an airplane, it was oval, or maybe rectangular.  and then where did it go?
the best way i can describe what i saw was that it looked like a bright portal in the sky closing.
content.summary: Stationary bright oval shaped object narrows to vertical slit, then vanishes in clear blue sky
